title: uchegod-21
author: uchegod-21
content: Here we go discuss and share information about the general elections as e enter your ear. Make we try drop only information wey dey verified and valid because for this community we dey try carry only legit information. For tomorrow presidential elections we get 3 popular candidates wey be;1. PETER OBI of Labour Party 2. ASIWAJU AHMED TINUBU of APC3. ATIKU ABUBAKAH of PDPThe first two from South while the 3rd person from North wey get the highest voting strength. Make we see how things go be.The preferred candidate for the youth na Peter Obi as 8 among every 10 youths dey shout Peter Obi.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: For Rivers State, plenty report on INEC dey. Till 12noon, many people never see INEC officials. The ones wey see been seem late. The BVAS machine dey slow. Both Magnus Agbe and Nyeso Wike dey shout for Radio.Even the INEC officials dey complain for the slow machine.E get video wey dey circulate for Aba wey plenty people dey under the rain and ready to vote.Many people na their first time to vote for their life.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: No be small thing o for my area,politicians scam us,dem no bring election materials come the PU. The few wey come kwa,na few ballot papers na e them carry come. So the electorates come say e no make sense like this, so make INEC carry their nonsense life commot for the community. Na the koko o,una no see another rigging method for here,wey dem won use rig election. So Nigeria at 62+ cannot conduct a free,fair and credible election. As for vote buying, I no think say the rate dey high like the passed elections. Like this I dey eager to hear the results them by tomorrow, since INEC don collect bribe and them no let us exercise of rights.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Omo eh never too tay when I enter house so, after we don wait for INEC official to come our polling unit finish we Kon still wait for hot sun and rain make people vote finish when he reach time to count votes.We were waiting for INEC staff to send the result via BVAS and also for the agent to sign, when we were attacked by armed men, it was terrific.After the incident, our result sheet couldn't be found and the SPO was nowhere to be found and wasn't taking his calls. The thing still dey pain me up till now.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: uchegod-21 on February 24, 2023, 07:47:15 PMHere we go discuss and share information about the general elections as e enter your ear. Make we try drop only information wey dey verified and valid because for this community we dey try carry only legit information. For tomorrow presidential elections we get 3 popular candidates wey be;1. PETER OBI of Labour Party 2. ASIWAJU AHMED TINUBU of APC3. ATIKU ABUBAKAH of PDPThe first two from South while the 3rd person from North wey get the highest voting strength. Make we see how things go be.The preferred candidate for the youth na Peter Obi as 8 among every 10 youths dey shout Peter Obi.You go need to edit this post and include the NNPP candidate in person of Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso cux Omo him sef no small for this election. The unexpected dey happen plenty for this election but INEC go determined sha. Nevertheless, this year election is the most interesting presidential election I have ever witness in Nigeria. Accolade to president Buhari and the INEC commission.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: knowngunman on February 26, 2023, 12:23:27 PMQuote from: uchegod-21 on February 24, 2023, 07:47:15 PMHere we go discuss and share information about the general elections as e enter your ear. Make we try drop only information wey dey verified and valid because for this community we dey try carry only legit information. For tomorrow presidential elections we get 3 popular candidates wey be;1. PETER OBI of Labour Party 2. ASIWAJU AHMED TINUBU of APC3. ATIKU ABUBAKAH of PDPThe first two from South while the 3rd person from North wey get the highest voting strength. Make we see how things go be.The preferred candidate for the youth na Peter Obi as 8 among every 10 youths dey shout Peter Obi.You go need to edit this post and include the NNPP candidate in person of Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso cux Omo him sef no small for this election. The unexpected dey happen plenty for this election but INEC go determined sha. Nevertheless, this year election is the most interesting presidential election I have ever witness in Nigeria. Accolade to president Buhari and the INEC commission. No be lie o kwankwaso too dey drag vote with PDP o.Finally,the election wey no hold for my area,INEC don come today and presently the election dey go on. No trouble and everything just dey go smoothly. I see say this time election dey more peacefully and coordinated compare to the passed ones. I don go cast my vote but before I succeed no be small thing due to the crowd wey turn up to cast their vote this time. E go shock some people by tomorrow when we hear the final result of the winner.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: knowngunman on February 26, 2023, 12:23:27 PMQuote from: uchegod-21 on February 24, 2023, 07:47:15 PMHere we go discuss and share information about the general elections as e enter your ear. Make we try drop only information wey dey verified and valid because for this community we dey try carry only legit information. For tomorrow presidential elections we get 3 popular candidates wey be;1. PETER OBI of Labour Party 2. ASIWAJU AHMED TINUBU of APC3. ATIKU ABUBAKAH of PDPThe first two from South while the 3rd person from North wey get the highest voting strength. Make we see how things go be.The preferred candidate for the youth na Peter Obi as 8 among every 10 youths dey shout Peter Obi.You go need to edit this post and include the NNPP candidate in person of Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso cux Omo him sef no small for this election. The unexpected dey happen plenty for this election but INEC go determined sha. Nevertheless, this year election is the most interesting presidential election I have ever witness in Nigeria. Accolade to president Buhari and the INEC commission. The president has actually put in measures to make sure this election is well coordinated I think this should be one of the most coordinated elections over the past years even with the review of the electoral act and, there has been an increase in the collection of PVC compare to the past years, let us keep following the collision of the results, it is getting more interesting because everybody is pulling votes in all direction, can not wait to see the finals from inec.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on February 27, 2023, 06:07:02 PMThe president has actually put in measures to make sure this election is well coordinated I think this should be one of the most coordinated elections over the past years even with the review of the electoral act and, there has been an increase in the collection of PVC compare to the past years, let us keep following the collision of the results, it is getting more interesting because everybody is pulling votes in all direction, can not wait to see the finals from inec.According to Josef Stalling "Those who cast the vote decide nothing but those who count the vote decide everything". I no no how u dey take dey look the election but I no agree with you. INEC don fail Nigerians, dem don do their magic, imagine investing billions of naira in the BVAS machine and these machines were test run before election and given green light, when e reach presidential they could not upload result on their portal, party logo ommited in the ballot papers, reporting late or not showing up at pulling units... So how do you define coordination?

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on February 27, 2023, 06:07:02 PMThe president has actually put in measures to make sure this election is well coordinated I think this should be one of the most coordinated elections over the past years even with the review of the electoral act and, there has been an increase in the collection of PVC compare to the past years, let us keep following the collision of the results, it is getting more interesting because everybody is pulling votes in all direction, can not wait to see the finals from inec.Yes oo, I wan't actually make a good comment about the overall election process because I never experience election wey be say them no even think of fighting for my area.INEC really try as them reduce the number of voters for some pooling units wey get more than 1000 voters and I believe that is why the election go well because that crowd alone they cause fight.Now na to wait for our next president to be announced because for only this election I see say so many parties they get hope apart from PDP and APC; this is one of the good things wey Buhari don do before him leave office.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: sokani on February 27, 2023, 06:33:17 PMINEC don fail Nigerians, This is the simple fact, INEC promised a credible free, fair and transparent election and it is not what Nigerians are seeing, and even International Observers have made this observation that the election was not transparent and free from wayo. See  here The election has not gone in line with the electoral act and Mahmood Yakubu should be held accountable for wasting for tax payers money on this excuse for an election. After the winner is announced, there will serious court cases.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: Rruchi man on February 27, 2023, 09:30:24 PMAfter the winner is announced, there will serious court cases.INEC don announce Tinubu of the APC winner of the 2023 presidential elections in Nigeria, me i no go lie you oh, the thing pain me wella, not only because i no believe say the baba get anything to offer us, but also because INEC don work against the will and choice of the people to favor the ruling party wey be APC. Before the election start, INEC promise Nigerians heaven and earth, but the reality no be wetin we see and the matter they very sad, this election will go down as one of the most poorly conducted in our history as a country.Having said that, definitely most of the other political parties would go to court, but imo na waste of time, our judiciary they useless, and if person fit buy INEC, why him no go buy the deciding members of the judiciary. As e be make we just focus on developing ourselves individually.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Coyster on March 01, 2023, 11:35:02 AMBefore the election start, INEC promise Nigerians heaven and earth, but the reality no be wetin we see and the matter they very sad, this election will go down as one of the most poorly conducted in our history as a country.Every sector of the country is just as bad as most of the politicians; they promise different things and in the end end up doing something of their own interest, not minding the danger it might pose. INEC's again just proved to Nigerians that they are all the same. QuoteHaving said that, definitely most of the other political parties would go to court, but imo na waste of time, our judiciary they useless, and if person fit buy INEC, why him no go buy the deciding members of the judiciary. As e be make we just focus on developing ourselves individually. The judiciary is programmed to help those in power, which is why President Buhari advised everyone who is against the electoral result to go to the court and not the street, because they know it will all be a waste of time and resources. Most people will go, but just like you said, nothing good will come out of it. They will only delay the handover time, but the already announced winner will still remain winner.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: RockBell on February 27, 2023, 06:07:02 PMQuote from: knowngunman on February 26, 2023, 12:23:27 PMQuote from: uchegod-21 on February 24, 2023, 07:47:15 PM. The president has actually put in measures to make sure this election is well coordinated I think this should be one of the most coordinated elections over the past years even with the review of the electoral act and, there has been an increase in the collection of PVC compare to the past years, let us keep following the collision of the results, it is getting more interesting because everybody is pulling votes in all direction, can not wait to see the finals from inec.I no know why RockBell dey praise INEC Nigeria. E be like you no dey this country or you dey read wetin dem write for newspaper. The INEC scammed the whole Nigeria. INEC is the failure of the year.BVAS Machine was a tool uses to decieve us to believe a dead system that was just raped.Quote from: Coyster on March 01, 2023, 11:35:02 AMQuote from: Rruchi man on February 27, 2023, 09:30:24 PMAfter the winner is announced, there will serious court cases..Having said that, definitely most of the other political parties would go to court, but imo na waste of time, our judiciary they useless, and if person fit buy INEC, Needless of the court, even the Judiciary is the worse sector. We are just doomed. Let's continue with the dead system, until miracle will happen

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on March 01, 2023, 12:28:31 PMThe judiciary is programmed to help those in power, which is why President Buhari advised everyone who is against the electoral result to go to the court and not the street, because they know it will all be a waste of time and resources.There's an African proverb that says when a thief keeps telling you to go to court just know that his elder brother is the judge. Even our judiciary is a failed system where the law is been bent to favour this set of persons. Many youth like myself thought we are going to get it right this time, that's why a good number of youths were involved compared to previous elections. It just so pathetic that the presidential election was rigged.
